display_long_description:
Step into a peaceful, family-friendly VR world where dinosaurs aren’t scary—they’re adorable companions to hatch, raise, and discover. In Dinosaur Garden, nurture baby dinos, help them grow, collect beautifully illustrated dino cards, and summon them back in full 3D. Perfect for children, parents, or VR beginners, this gentle experience is designed to make you smile.

In Gaming Mode, discover seven mystery eggs, touch them to hatch, and care for your dinos by feeding, petting, and filling their Food and Happiness bars. Fully cared-for dinosaurs grow into adults and reward you with collectible cards, which can be tapped to bring them to life in 3D.

In Learning Mode, explore nine life-sized dinosaurs in immersive 3D. Walk around, observe their proportions, climb viewing towers, and learn through narration and text. This transforms prehistoric education into an unforgettable VR adventure.

Features include hatching and raising seven dinosaur species, collecting unique dino cards, exploring real-scale dinosaurs, intuitive VR interactions for all ages, and a calm, stylized garden with no combat or fear. Every dinosaur is unique, and each session brings new discoveries. Relax, explore, and create your peaceful dinosaur sanctuary—what will you hatch next?
